Package cs131.pa2.CarsTunnels

Class PriorityScheduler

  • java.lang.Object
    • cs131.pa2.Abstract.Tunnel
      • cs131.pa2.CarsTunnels.PriorityScheduler
  • public class PriorityScheduler
extends Tunnel
    The priority scheduler assigns vehicles to tunnels based on their priority It extends the Tunnel class.
    Author:
    cs131a

    • Method Detail

      • tryToEnterInner

        public boolean tryToEnterInner​(Vehicle vehicle)
        Override tryToEnterInner method. Achieve synchronization using locks and condition variable The vehicle can enter the tunnel if and only if it has the highest priority in the priority queue and the meets the entry condition of one tunnel.
        Specified by:
        tryToEnterInner in class Tunnel
        Parameters:
        vehicle - The vehicle that is attempting to enter
        Returns:
        true if the vehicle successfully enter the tunnel

      • exitTunnelInner

        public void exitTunnelInner​(Vehicle vehicle)
        let the vehicle exit the tunnel. Signal all awaiting threads to try to enter the tunnel.
        Specified by:
        exitTunnelInner in class Tunnel
        Parameters:
        vehicle - The vehicle that is exiting the tunnel
